title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the expression new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: An error message is thrown when trying to use the expression new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter.
EB: When saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
  1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
  2. Insert a table into the report.
  3. Create a filter based on the datetime column.
  4. In the 'value1' field of the filter, input the expression new Date("...") with a specific date, for example: new Date("3/2/2005").
